title: I’m sorry.
author: Caddicarus
description:
I spent $10,000 and nearly destroyed my channel. Here's my story. Animation and illustrations by @boymylife , editing/audio/effects by me. Thank you so much, Kyle. This video wouldn’t have been possible without you. https://www.youtube.com/boymylife  https://twitter.com/boymylifeyt  Also, special thanks to LevelUpGaming for stepping in at the last minute to save my video production as quickly as possible! https://www.levelupgaming.co.uk/ ▼ FOLLOW MY SOCIALS ▼

PATREON! (early access videos, no ads, credits, exclusive videos…) = http://www.patreon.com/caddicarus 
TWITCH! = http://www.twitch.tv/Caddicarus
INSTAGRAM! = http://www.instagram.com/caddicarus
LETTERBOXD MOVIE REVIEWS! = http://www.letterboxd.com/Caddicarus
TWITTER! = http://www.twitter.com/Caddicarus
CHEAP GAMES (sometimes less than $1!) EVERY 24 HOURS! = https://caddicarus.chrono.gg/
TUMBLR! = http://thecaddicarus.tumblr.com
FACEBOOK! = http://www.facebook.com/Caddicarus

Don't forget to join the channel right here = https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus?sub_confirmation=1 🔔 AND PLEASE HIT THE NOTIFICATION BELL! 🔔

Hello, I’m Caddicarus. And I’m sorry. I hope you’re all ready, because you’re about to see my story about the time I spent a ridiculous amount of money on a new PC, only to end up spending even more and nearly losing my channel. I thought I’d try something animated this time and a lot different - instead of me being on screen, I figured a funny cartoon animation in a similar style to theodd1sout would best illustrate how funny and unlucky this whole saga turned out to be. This is a lot more than a minute-long Caddicarus animated - this is a huge retelling of my story animated, in a special one-off animated story time. Actually, now that I think about it, is it theodd1sout or oddonesout? No clue. Maybe this is closer to Jaiden and their animations. Jaidenanimations? Jaidenanimation? I’m completely new to this story time animated kind of video, I’m a bit of touch. How about JelloApocolypse? I dunno, I’m totally lost. Either way - with special thanks to boymylife - I hope you enjoy my true story all about my how to build a PC teaching went entirely wrong. Gaming PC build s are a nightmare, and here’s why. And yes, I not only managed to get an NVIDIA RTX 3080 PC for my office, but an RTX 3090 for the streaming and recording PC too. I’m lucky. But not that lucky. Prebuilt PC’s, build your own PC, everything is covered here.


Caddicarus 8bit themes by Endigo = https://www.youtube.com/user/Endigo

Caddicarus logo by Jan Animation = https://www.youtube.com/user/jananimationstudios/videos

Kevin MacLeod's royalty free music! = http://incompetech.com

OLLY'S CAMERA WORK! = https://www.youtube.com/SuperOllyRoss


Watch more storytime animation videos and comedy game reviews on my channel! | Caddicarus

https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus

#Storytime #Animated #Cartoon #Caddicarus #PCBuild #Gaming

localize.description:
我花了一万块钱，差点毁了我的渠道。这就是我的故事。动画和插图由@boymylife制作，编辑/音频/特效由我完成。非常感谢你，凯尔。https://www.youtube.com/boymylife https://twitter.com/boymylifeyt 另外，特别感谢LevelUpGaming在最后时刻的介入，尽快拯救了我的视频制作！ https://www.levelupgaming.co.uk/ ▼ 关注我的社交网站▼。

PATREON! (早期访问视频，无广告，信用，独家视频...) = http://www.patreon.com/caddicarus 
TWITCH！=http://www.twitch.tv/Caddicarus
INSTAGRAM！=http://www.instagram.com/caddicarus
LETTERBOXD电影评论！=http://www.letterboxd.com/Caddicarus。
TWITTER！ = http://www.twitter.com/Caddicarus
廉价游戏（有时不到1美元！）每24小时！=https://caddicarus.chrono.gg/。
TUMBLR！ = http://thecaddicarus.tumblr.com
FACEBOOK! = http://www.facebook.com/Caddicarus

不要忘了在这里加入频道=https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus?sub_confirmation=1 🔔，请点击通知铃! 🔔

你好，我是卡迪卡洛斯。我很抱歉 我希望你们都准备好了，因为你们即将看到我的故事，关于我花了一大笔钱买了一台新电脑，最后却花了更多的钱，差点失去了我的频道。我想这次我会尝试一些动画和很多不同的东西 - 而不是我在屏幕上，我想一个有趣的卡通动画在一个类似的风格，以theodd1sout将最好地说明这整个传奇原来是多么有趣和倒霉。这不仅仅是一个长达一分钟的Caddicarus动画，这是一个巨大的重述我的故事的动画，在一个特殊的一次性动画故事时间。其实，现在想来，是theodd1sout还是oddonesout？没有头绪。也许这更接近于Jaiden和他们的动画。Jaidenanimations？Jaidenanimation？我对这种故事时间动画类的视频完全陌生，我有点摸不着头脑。JelloApocolypse怎么样？我不知道，我完全不知道。无论哪种方式--特别感谢boymylife--我希望你喜欢我的真实故事，都是关于我的如何建立一个PC教学完全错误的。游戏PC构建s是一个噩梦，这就是为什么。是的，我不仅设法得到一个NVIDIA RTX 3080 PC为我的办公室，但一个RTX 3090的流媒体和录音PC太。我很幸运。但没有那么幸运。预制电脑，自己打造电脑，这里什么都有。


Caddicarus 8bit主题由Endigo=https://www.youtube.com/user/Endigo。

Caddicarus标志由Jan Animation创作=https://www.youtube.com/user/jananimationstudios/videos。

Kevin MacLeod的免版税音乐! = http://incompetech.com

OLLY's CAMERA WORK！=https://www.youtube.com/SuperOllyRoss。


在我的频道里观看更多的故事时间动画视频和喜剧游戏评测! | 卡迪卡洛斯

https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus

#Storytime #Animated #Cartoon #Caddicarus #PCBuild #Gaming
localize.title: 我很抱歉

localize.description:
我花了一萬塊錢，差點毀了我的渠道。這就是我的故事。動畫和插圖由@boymylife製作，編輯/音頻/特效由我完成。非常感謝你，凱爾。https://www.youtube.com/boymylife https://twitter.com/boymylifeyt 另外，特別感謝LevelUpGaming在最後時刻的介入，儘快拯救了我的視頻製作！ https://www.levelupgaming.co.uk/ ▼ 關注我的社交網站▼。

PATREON! (早期訪問視頻，無廣告，信用，獨家視頻...) = http://www.patreon.com/caddicarus 
TWITCH！=http://www.twitch.tv/Caddicarus
INSTAGRAM！=http://www.instagram.com/caddicarus
LETTERBOXD電影評論！=http://www.letterboxd.com/Caddicarus。
TWITTER！ = http://www.twitter.com/Caddicarus
廉價遊戲（有時不到1美元！）每24小時！=https://caddicarus.chrono.gg/。
TUMBLR！ = http://thecaddicarus.tumblr.com
FACEBOOK! = http://www.facebook.com/Caddicarus

不要忘了在這裏加入頻道=https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus?sub_confirmation=1 🔔，請點擊通知鈴! 🔔

你好，我是卡迪卡洛斯。我很抱歉 我希望你們都準備好了，因爲你們即將看到我的故事，關於我花了一大筆錢買了一臺新電腦，最後卻花了更多的錢，差點失去了我的頻道。我想這次我會嘗試一些動畫和很多不同的東西 - 而不是我在屏幕上，我想一個有趣的卡通動畫在一個類似的風格，以theodd1sout將最好地說明這整個傳奇原來是多麼有趣和倒黴。這不僅僅是一個長達一分鐘的Caddicarus動畫，這是一個巨大的重述我的故事的動畫，在一個特殊的一次性動畫故事時間。其實，現在想來，是theodd1sout還是oddonesout？沒有頭緒。也許這更接近於Jaiden和他們的動畫。Jaidenanimations？Jaidenanimation？我對這種故事時間動畫類的視頻完全陌生，我有點摸不着頭腦。JelloApocolypse怎麼樣？我不知道，我完全不知道。無論哪種方式--特別感謝boymylife--我希望你喜歡我的真實故事，都是關於我的如何建立一個PC教學完全錯誤的。遊戲PC構建s是一個噩夢，這就是爲什麼。是的，我不僅設法得到一個NVIDIA RTX 3080 PC爲我的辦公室，但一個RTX 3090的流媒體和錄音PC太。我很幸運。但沒有那麼幸運。預製電腦，自己打造電腦，這裏什麼都有。


Caddicarus 8bit主題由Endigo=https://www.youtube.com/user/Endigo。

Caddicarus標誌由Jan Animation創作=https://www.youtube.com/user/jananimationstudios/videos。

Kevin MacLeod的免版稅音樂! = http://incompetech.com

OLLY's CAMERA WORK！=https://www.youtube.com/SuperOllyRoss。


在我的頻道里觀看更多的故事時間動畫視頻和喜劇遊戲評測! | 卡迪卡洛斯
